channel.title: CVE Feed for MZ Automation -- libiec61850
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MZ Automation -- libiec61850

item.title: CVE-2022-2972|2024-09-16T16:34:06.151Z -- mz%20automation -- libiec61850
item.description: MZ Automation's libIEC61850 (versions 1.4 and prior; version 1.5 prior to commit a3b04b7bc4872a5a39e5de3fdc5fbde52c09e10e) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to crash the device or remotely execute arbitrary code.
